targets.expr: sum(mist_playux_perfect) by (catalyst_node) / ((sum(mist_playux_bad) by (catalyst_node) + sum(mist_playux_okay) by (catalyst_node) + sum(mist_playux_perfect) by (catalyst_node)) > 10)

panels.title: UX: Flawless playback percentage per server

targets.expr: sum(mist_playux_perfect{prot!=""}) by (prot) / (sum(mist_playux_bad) by (prot) + sum(mist_playux_okay) by (prot) + sum(mist_playux_perfect) by (prot))

panels.title: UX: Flawless playback percentage per protocol

targets.expr: sum(mist_playux_perfect{qual!=""}) by (qual) / ((sum(mist_playux_bad) by (qual) + sum(mist_playux_okay) by (qual) + sum(mist_playux_perfect) by (qual)) > 5)

panels.title: UX: Flawless playback percentage per quality

targets.expr: sum(mist_playux_bad{prot!=""}) by (prot) + sum(mist_playux_okay{prot!=""}) by (prot) + sum(mist_playux_perfect{prot!=""}) by (prot)
sum(mist_playux_bad) by (qual) + sum(mist_playux_okay) by (qual) + sum(mist_playux_perfect) by (qual)

panels.title: UX: Measured streams by quality level

targets.expr: (sum(mist_playux_perfect{geo!=""}) by (geo) / ((sum(mist_playux_bad{geo!=""}) by (geo) + sum(mist_playux_okay{geo!=""}) by (geo) + sum(mist_playux_perfect{geo!=""}) by (geo))))*100
(sum(mist_playux_bad) by (strm) + sum(mist_playux_okay) by (strm)) > ((sum(mist_playux_perfect) by (strm) + sum(mist_playux_bad) by (strm) + sum(mist_playux_okay) by (strm)) / 3) > 3

panels.title: Viewers with a bad experience, per stream
